DOC.brief_summary: This observational study is conducted globally. The aim of the study is to investigate the effectiveness and safety of real-life treatment with Norditropin®. The study population will consist of children and adults who are on treatment with Norditropin® in accordance with normal clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Prospective Study on Patients Treated With Norditropin®
DOC.criteria: Judged by the physician as per the Norditropin® label Judged by the physician as per the Norditropin® label
